qas.question: What natural resource dropped in value?
What did the Shanghai Stock Exchange do?
Where were companies located that had their stock trading suspended?
What metal rose due to speculation?
Besides the Shanghai Stock Exchange, what other exchange suspended trading of southwestern China stock?

context: Both the Shanghai Stock Exchange and the <a6_0>Shenzhen Stock Exchange<a6_0/> <a3_0>suspended trading<a3_0/> of companies based in <a0_0><a4_0>southwestern China<a4_0/><a0_0/>. <a1_0><a5_0>Copper<a5_0/><a1_0/> rose over speculations that production in southwestern China may be affected, and <a2_0>oil<a2_0/> prices dropped over speculations that demand from China would fall.
